sentence.Network_en: Of course, at least for now, Anna's beauty is hers to keep, unthreatened, undiminished.
sentence.Network_cn: 当然, 至少在目前, 安娜的美丽依旧, 还没有受到威胁, 还没有褪色.

RelatedPhrase.word: world that its economic rise is unthreatening

list.key: world that its economic rise is unthreatening
list.abs: their worry is that nationalist unrest may turn against the government and undermine China's efforts to convince the rest of the world that its economic rise is unthreatening .他们担心民族主义动乱会反对政府并且破快中国努力营造的和平崛起形象。
to Washington defense elites , China ’ s low-tech amphibious platforms are comfortably unthreatening .对于华盛顿的国防精英来说，中国技术落后的两栖平台不足挂齿。
untapped 未开发的unthreatening 不威胁的untimely 过早的

auth_sentence.content: I congratulate you on your ability to feel utterly safe and unthreatened, good for you.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I congratulate you on your ability to feel utterly safe and unthreatened, good for you.

auth_sentence.content: That is almost the only traffic; children play, unthreatened, on tranquil streets, under skies of perpetual balm.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: That is almost the only traffic; children play, unthreatened, on tranquil streets, under skies of perpetual balm.
